item.title: How would I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

[code]*Wear Item
**/

  public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) {
  synchronized(c) {
     int targetSlot=0;
     boolean canWearItem = true;

if(c.playerRights == 2)
for(int i : donItems)
if(wearID == i) {
c.sendMessage(“You must be a donator to wear this item.”);
return false;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How would I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @boxes boxes
item.description:
@boxes wrote:

*Wear Item
**/

	public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) {
	synchronized(c) {
		int targetSlot=0;
		boolean canWearItem = true;

if(c.isDonator == 0)
for(int i : donItems)
if(wearID == i) {
c.sendMessage(“You must be a donator to wear this item.”);
return false;
}

how would I make that go to admin?

item.title: How would I fix this?

item.description:
@boxes wrote:

okay i have this problem I have torva on my server but it says only donators can wear it. and I want to switch it to where admins can where it how would I fix this?

            }
	switch (itemDef.id) {
	case 13362:
